      • transmitApdu

        public abstract java.nio.ByteBuffer transmitApdu(java.nio.ByteBuffer apduIn)
                                          throws ChannelStateReaderException
        Transmits a single APDU and receives its response. The implementation of this abstract method must handle the case where the SE response is 61xy and execute the appropriate get response command
        Parameters:
        apduIn - byte buffer containing the ingoing data
        Returns:
        apduResponse byte buffer containing the outgoing data.
        Throws:
        ChannelStateReaderException

      • processSeRequestSet

        public final SeResponseSet processSeRequestSet(SeRequestSet requestSet)
                                        throws IOReaderException
        Do the transmission of all needed requestSet requests contained in the provided requestSet according to the protocol flag selection logic. The responseSet responses are returned in the responseSet object. The requestSet requests are ordered at application level and the responses match this order. When a requestSet is not matching the current PO, the responseSet responses pushed in the responseSet object is set to null.
        Specified by:
        processSeRequestSet in class AbstractObservableReader
        Parameters:
        requestSet -
        Returns:
        responseSet
        Throws:
        IOReaderException

        Returns:
        true if the logical channel is open
